job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtSenior Site Reliability Engineer  Austin TX or RemoteltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtLawrence Harvey is partnering with a cloudbased SaaS leader in the Mobile Infrastructure space that is actively looking for a Senior Site Reliability Engineer to join their talented Infrastructure Engineering teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIn this role you will be responsible for managing building supporting and maintaining their internal cloud infrastructure by automating infrastructure as code IaC In addition you will have the chance to work crossfunctionally with other engineering teams including the security and cloud engineering teamsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSkills RequiredltpgtltulgtltligtLinux engineering backgroundltligtltligtPrevious Infrastructure  Site Reliability Engineering experienceltligtltligtAbility to code using either Python or JavaltligtltligtCloud Experience AWS or AzureltligtltligtContainer andor orchestration platforms including Docker and KubernetesltligtltligtConfiguration management and automation tools including Puppet and TerraformltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf this position is of interest please email me at dwhitelawrenceharveycomltpgt
